reference.shortdesc: The steps-informal element contains a set of informal steps. Informal steps do not follow a strict content model; a paragraph might describe more than one step, or a paragraph might combine procedural information along with other information.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The steps-informal element is specialized from section. It is defined in the task module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: .

example.title: Example
example.p: An author uses the following markup to provide informal information about how to grow a flower from seed:
example.codeblock:
Growing a flower from seed

Put the soil in the container any old way. It doesn't really matter how you do it as long as it is at least 12 cm deep. Once the soil is in place, plant the seeds, water appropriately and wait.
